rooms.description: A spacious entryway with a foyer that sets the tone for the bungalow, featuring subtle Chettinad architectural elements such as ornate cornices and detailed wood carvings. The design adheres to Vastu principles by aligning the entrance towards the north-east for auspicious energy.

An open-plan living area with floor-to-ceiling windows that enhance natural light and ventilation. The design features large windows on the south-east side to maximize sunlight while maintaining privacy, following Vastu guidelines.

A designated dining space adjacent to the living room, with a glass wall connecting it to an open balcony facing east, ensuring ample morning light and fresh air circulation. The layout is designed in accordance with Vastu by orienting the seating towards the north.
Modern kitchen layout located on the north side of the bungalow. Floor-to-ceiling windows provide ample daylight, and the design integrates traditional Chettinad motifs in cabinetry details.

A dedicated workspace with adjustable lighting, positioned near the living area for easy access. The design includes a bay window that overlooks the garden to maintain a connection with nature, following Vastu guidelines.
A compact utility space housing storage and laundry facilities. Designed for efficiency with minimalistic yet functional layouts.

openings.location: north-eastern wall of the entrance hall
openings.description: Designed to welcome positive energy as per Vastu, with a modern door incorporating traditional wooden carvings.

openings.location: living room and kitchen walls facing south-west
openings.description: Large windows ensure maximum natural light and ventilation. They are positioned to provide panoramic views of the garden, enhancing both aesthetics and functionality.
Connects the interior space with an open balcony overlooking the garden, ensuring a seamless flow between indoor and outdoor living spaces.

openings.location: adjacent to the utility room in the south-west corner
openings.description: A discreet staircase leading to the upper level, designed for ease of movement while maintaining privacy and security.

garden_design.description: An expansive garden surrounding the bungalow, featuring native Chettinad landscaping with a blend of traditional water features, aromatic plants, and shaded seating areas. The garden is designed to enhance natural ventilation and create an inviting outdoor living space.
